name: Patagonia Lightweight A/C Buttondown Shirt - Women's
description:
Warm-weather chaser? The lightweight breezy fabric of this AC button-down top will help you keep cool when AC might not be an option.Lightweight material is great for hot days.Chest pockets with button flaps keep small necessities close and safe.Regular fit.
